resources.string: In a Box means memorable gifts and products that you will love a lifetime. Hand-crafted by Romanian artists in limited series. Carefully selected for the smallest detail, however simple.
Join the In a Box community!
We promise only good news, with no annoying messages.
You can reach us at salut@inabox.ro, or on the phone (+40)733 412 703 from Monday to Friday, 10:00 - 19:00
